# Touying Slide Theme for Linköping University

Slide theme for Linköping University, mimicking the official keynote template.

## Usage
Use `typst init @preview/touying-liu` to create a new project with this theme.

```console
$ typst init @preview/touying-liu
Successfully created new project from @preview/touying-liu:<latest>
To start writing, run:
> cd touying-liu
> typst watch main.typ
```

## Backgrounds
Additional backgrounds for the title page can be downloaded from https://gitlab.liu.se/erifr93/touying-liu/-/tree/master/assets/backgrounds.
